text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump WHO is now saying that Asymptomatic spread of Covid-19 is RARE.What the what! Do you know everyday I  was looking at cases & # of deaths - NOW search where have the DEATH numbers gone????They are getting scared that We The People are realizing the TRUTH!! LEARN ABOUT MAGNA CARTA!
